title: My Girlfriends Are Leaving Me Out
description:
12-year-old Chloe's “friend” group is proving to have some not-so-nice girls in it. - Dr. Laura: "Don't take the actions of mean girls personally."

How did you handle the friend-drama of your childhood? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment. Become a Dr. Laura Family Member: https://www.drlaura.com/ See https://www.drlaura.com/privacy-policy for privacy information.
